mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM -1 as ROWNUM, ta.r_id as rId, ta.r_content as rContent, ta.r_writer as rWriter, ta.r_datetime as rDateTime, ta.u_id as uId, ta.b_id as bId, ta.p_num as p_num, ta.s_num as s_num from reply ta, (select @rownum := (select count(*)-#{page}+1 from reply ta where b_id=#{bId})) tb where ta.b_id = #{bId} limit #{page}, 10
SELECT r_id as rId, r_content as rContent, r_writer as rWriter, r_datetime as rDateTime, u_id as uId, p_num as p_num from reply where p_num = #{p_num}
SELECT r_id as rId, r_content as rContent, r_writer as rWriter, r_datetime as rDateTime, u_id as uId, s_num as s_num from reply where s_num = #{s_num}
mapper.insert: insert into reply ( r_id, r_content, r_writer, b_id, u_id, p_num, s_num ) values ( #{rId}, #{rContent}, #{rWriter}, #{bId}, #{uId}, #{p_num}, #{s_num} )
